#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
        ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int T,i;
	long long int X;
	cin>>T;
	for(i=0;i<T;i++){
	   cin>>X;
	  if(X%4==0)
	    cout<<X<<endl;
	  else if(X%4==1)
	    cout<<1<<endl;
	  else if(X%4==2)
	    cout<<X+1<<endl;
	  else if(X%4==3)
	    cout<<0<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
